item.description: Chat Mutations # This tutorial will enable you to query and send messages to the chat using the Glimesh API. If you are looking to build a chatbot or other program that needs a constant connection view this tutorial. To connect to a chat you will need an access token or a client ID. Keep in mind that using a client ID will keep you in read-only mode for chat environments.

Chat WebSockets # Glimesh uses WebSockets to allow for constant communication between you and the chat API. To connect to a chat you will need an access token or a client ID. Keep in mind that using a client ID will keep you in read-only mode for chat environments. The access token must have the chat scope to post messages.
